tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  position VARCHAR,
  nationality VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE players (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  position VARCHAR(50),
  nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE teams (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE matches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team1_id INT,
    team2_id INT,
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE player_information (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE stats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    goals INT,
    assists INT,
    yellow_cards INT,
    red_cards INT
);
